Loadings


  

  

    
Loading colors

      
For customize colors, add class blue, green, orange,
          grey or black beside the loading class.

      

          

          

      

      

          

          

      

      

          

          

      

      

          

          

      

      

          

          

      

      

          

          

      

  

  

      
Loading sizes

      
For customize sizes, add class mini, medium, large or x-large
          beside class loading.
